has research problem.from sentence: Natural Language Comprehension with the EpiReader
We present the EpiReader , a novel model for machine comprehension of text .

has research problem: Machine comprehension of unstructured , real - world text

has research problem.from sentence: Machine comprehension of unstructured , real - world text is a major research goal for natural language processing .
Current tests of machine comprehension pose questions whose answers can be inferred from some supporting text , and evaluate a model 's response to the questions .
